answers.text:
Hello,
I found some resources that may be helpful as a start.
Here is a sample towing contract from Portland, OR.
http://www.portlandonline.com/omf/index.cfm?c=37251
I have also included two sample RFP’s from cities that have requested contractors. 
Haines, AK
http://www.hainesborough.us/rfp/RFP%20Towing.pdf
Lacey, WA
http://www.ci.lacey.wa.us/city-government/municipal-code/business-licenses-registration-and-regulations/wrecker-and-towing-services/
Below is a report on Municipal Towing Guidelines from the Towing and Recovery Association of America.
http://www.towserver.net/PDF/municipal_towing_guide.pdf
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org

author: [Anonymous]
text: A city is currently contracting for towing service but would like to evaluate whether eliminating these services and having the city provide them is cost effective.  Do other cities perform towing services themselves or contract out?  Has anyone recently made the move to provide towing services in-house?
title: In-House Towing Services
